DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate effect dispenser 's buzzer function compliance daily tablet intake ethinyl estradiol ( EE ) + drospirenone ( DRSP ) contain oral contraceptive ( OC ) flexible extend regimen administer approximately 12 month healthy female volunteer request contraception .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Compliance With Oral Contraceptive SH T00186D Flexible Extended Regimen Supported Dispenser With Reminder Function
DOC.criteria: Healthy female volunteer 18 35 year age ( smoker 30 year , inclusive ) request contraceptive protection Pregnancy lactation ( le 3 month since delivery , abortion , lactation start treatment ) Body mass index ( BMI ) > /= 30.0 kg/m2 Presence history venous arterial thrombotic/thromboembolic event Repeated measurement systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 90 mmHg . Presence history liver tumor ( benign malignant ) , severe hepatic disease , jaundice and/or pruritus related cholestasis , cholestatic jaundice associate pregnancy previous COC use Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus and/or diabetes mellitus vascular involvement Severe dyslipoproteinemia Malignant premalignant disease Uncontrolled thyroid disorder Chronic inflammatory bowel disease Severe renal insufficiency acute renal failure History migraine focal neurologic symptom Epilepsy
